title: 'Not a long term keyboard'
body: starting months were excellent but after months I began noticing keys getting missed while typing the same in-game, at first I ignored as it was only with 1 key but then it became worse as from one it is happening with 12 keys which either not working or had press multiple times to get it register.  I raised the issue and had specifically mentioned the keys in which the issue was happening but they didn't even bother to verify that and returned the keyboard the same day they received to check.  Also, they don't have any dedicated service centre, they provide service via Boat Service centre.  If you want a long-term purchase then this is not for you, i am now buying a new keyboard and that will surely not going to be from readgear

title: 'Awesome value for money'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. Awesome keyboard with buttery smooth keys. This is my first mechanical keyboard. And i am not a professional gamer
column5: using it for coding. I feel like my typing speed has been increased with this keyboard. I Like the keystrokes sound of blue switches. It comes with all shortcuts on functional keys also the volume knob gives rich look to it. Lighting is more than enough to make it look crazy. You will get plenty of preset lighting animations. You can install the software to control many more things. It’s ergonomically designed to give you comfort while typing. It comes with wrist rest. This keyboard weighs more than a kilo with metallic body. Overall superb keyboard must try of your budget is under 2500 Rps.'

title: 'Key failure'

title: 'Exceeded my expectations in every aspect'
body: 'I purchased this Mechanical Keyboard three months ago
column6: it has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. From performance to design
column7: this keyboard has truly won me over.  Performance and Key Press: The keypress on the Redgear Shadow Blade is exceptional. The mechanical switches provide a satisfying tactile feedback
column8: and each keypress feels precise and responsive. The clicky sound adds to the overall typing experience
column9: making it not only functional but also enjoyable.  Durability and Reliability: After three months of regular usage
column10: the keyboard still functions flawlessly. The build quality is impressive
column11: and it seems like it can endure prolonged use without any signs of wear and tear. The keys are sturdy and show no signs of fading or loss of functionality.  Design and Aesthetics: The sleek design of the keyboard adds a touch of sophistication to my workspace. The RGB backlighting not only looks great but also enhances visibility in dimly lit environments. The keys are well-spaced and ergonomic
column12: making long typing sessions comfortable and efficient.  Cons: After extensive use
column13: I have yet to come across any significant drawbacks or cons with the this Mechanical Keyboard. It has truly proven to be a reliable companion for both work and gaming
column14: offering a seamless experience without any noticeable downsides.'
